name: Don't Starve Your Dog
description:
Don't Starve Your Dog      About

A collaborative game prototype
created during Global Game Jam 2019 in Victoria, BC.

     Control(s):

Left-click to do everything.

     Art by

Marcel Jucá and Gregory Perry

     Code by

Michael Demone, and Glen McManus

     Repo:

https://github.com/glenmcmanus/ggj2019
